line.originaltext: 1 pound cubed beef stew meat
line.annotation: create_ing(ing0, "1 pound cubed beef stew meat")

line.originaltext: 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour
2 tablespoons olive oil
2 teaspoons butter
1 medium yellow onion, thinly sliced
line.annotation: create_ing(ing4, "1 medium yellow onion, thinly sliced")

line.originaltext: 1/4 cup red wine
1 beef bouillon cube
1 cup hot water
1 large potato, cubed
1/2 cup baby carrots
1/2 teaspoon rosemary
1/2 teaspoon dried thyme
1/2 tablespoon garlic powder
1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
1/4 cup water
2 dashes Worcestershire sauce
Place cubed beef and flour in a resealable plastic bag.
Place cubed beef and flour in a resealable plastic bag.
Place cubed beef and flour in a resealable plastic bag.
Seal and shake to evenly coat beef with flour.
Seal and shake to evenly coat beef with flour.
Seal and shake to evenly coat beef with flour.
Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat, and brown beef on all sides.
Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat, and brown beef on all sides.
line.annotation: cook(ing2, t1, ing18, "hot oil", "heat over medium heat")

line.originaltext: Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat, and brown beef on all sides.
Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat, and brown beef on all sides.
Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat, and brown beef on all sides.
line.annotation: cook(ing19, t1, ing20, "brown beef", "brown beef over medium heat ")

line.originaltext: Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat, and brown beef on all sides.
Transfer to a slow cooker.
Transfer to a slow cooker.
Melt the butter in the skillet over medium heat, and cook onion until tender.
line.annotation: cook(ing3, t1, ing21, "melted butter", "melt over medium heat")

line.originaltext: Melt the butter in the skillet over medium heat, and cook onion until tender.
Melt the butter in the skillet over medium heat, and cook onion until tender.
line.annotation: cook(ing22, t1, ing23, "cooked onion", "cook over medium heat")

line.originaltext: Melt the butter in the skillet over medium heat, and cook onion until tender.
Transfer to the slow cooker with the beef.
Transfer to the slow cooker with the beef.
line.annotation: combine({ing20, ing23}, ing24, "things in slow cooker", "")

line.originaltext: Pour wine into the skillet to deglaze, then pour wine into slow cooker.
Pour wine into the skillet to deglaze, then pour wine into slow cooker.
Pour wine into the skillet to deglaze, then pour wine into slow cooker.
line.annotation: combine({ing24, ing25}, ing26, "things in slow cooker", "")

line.originaltext: Dissolve the beef bouillon cube in 1 cup hot water, and pour into slow cooker.
line.annotation: combine({ing6, ing7}, ing27, "dissolved bouillon", "dissolve cube in water")

line.originaltext: Dissolve the beef bouillon cube in 1 cup hot water, and pour into slow cooker.
Dissolve the beef bouillon cube in 1 cup hot water, and pour into slow cooker.
Place potato and carrots in slow cooker, and season with rosemary, thyme, garlic powder, and pepper.
Place potato and carrots in slow cooker, and season with rosemary, thyme, garlic powder, and pepper.
Place potato and carrots in slow cooker, and season with rosemary, thyme, garlic powder, and pepper.
line.annotation: combine({ing28, ing8, ing9}, ing29, "things in cooker", "")

line.originaltext: Place potato and carrots in slow cooker, and season with rosemary, thyme, garlic powder, and pepper.
Place potato and carrots in slow cooker, and season with rosemary, thyme, garlic powder, and pepper.
Place potato and carrots in slow cooker, and season with rosemary, thyme, garlic powder, and pepper.
Mix in remaining water and Worcestershire sauce.
Mix in remaining water and Worcestershire sauce.
Mix in remaining water and Worcestershire sauce.
line.annotation: combine({ing14, ing15, ing31}, ing32, "things in cooker", "mix in water and sauce")

line.originaltext: Add more water if needed to cover all ingredients.
Add more water if needed to cover all ingredients.
line.annotation: do(ing32, , ing33, "things in cooker", "add more water if all ingredients not covered")

line.originaltext: Cover slow cooker, and cook stew 7 to 8 hours on Low.
Cover slow cooker, and cook stew 7 to 8 hours on Low.
line.annotation: cook(ing33, t2, ing34, "stew", "cook 7 to 8 hours on Low")

line.originaltext: Cover slow cooker, and cook stew 7 to 8 hours on Low.
